author: GameSpot
description:
Check out the full Zero Hour Event in Fortnite. We get some guest appearances from Hatsune Miku, Huntr/x (Rumi, Zoey, Mira), Voltron, Godzilla, Homer Simpson and more. Enjoy the full gameplay for the event here if you missed it or want to experience it again.

#fortnite #zerohour #gaming
title: Fortnite Zero Hour Chapter 6 Finale Event Gameplay

author: GameSpot
description:
It's Thanksgiving week here in the United States! Instead of covering the news, Kurt and Lucy will be doing a special all viewer mail edition, because we're thankful for you!

Email your letters to gotchacovered@gamespot.com

Check out the audio version:
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/4S5mfmLES0ubhj5xcDZJni
RSS Feed: https://www.spreaker.com/show/6752166/episodes/feed

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
01:45 - Which Game Characters Are We Inviting To Thanksgiving?
09:03 - Should More Game's License Out Their Game Worlds?
15:02 - Why Old Game IP Rights Are a Nightmare
19:29 - Our Favorite Point and Click Adventure Games
26:14 - Sex Scenes In Video Games
34:18 - Favorite Video Game Bug/Glitch
41:49 - How Have Our Video Game Habits Changed Over the Years?
title: Oops! All Viewer Mail | Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered
